components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE
summary: THE CAR STALLED ON ME TWICE.  ONE TIME ON THE HIGHWAY GOING 65 M/H.  THE ENGINE COMPLETELY SHUT OFF AND CAME BACK ON.  THE SECOND TIME ON A STREET ROAD GOING 25M/H.  THE DEALERSHIP CHECKED IT BOTH TIMES AND THEY SAID THE COMPUTER SHOWS NO MALFUNCTIONS AND THEY CAN'T FIGURE OUT THE CAUSE.  HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE.
